name: Hopeless 2: Cave Escape
description:
It’s monster shooting time! Hunt monsters for coins and upgrade your guns!

Hopeless 2: Cave Escape is an action adventure game in a dark world infested with monsters! The endless cave-riddled by scary creatures that are hunting the cute blobs. Ride the armed minecart with a powerful gun to save your lost buddies!
Complete all levels and unlock all weapons using the hidden coins in the mine!

KEY FEATURES:
• Advance through the cave with more levels!
• The blobs are on the move!
• Jump right into the action without a tedious tutorial!
• Test your shooting in this pulse-pounding dark limbo environment!
• Think fast, act fast! Push your skills to the limit!
• Enhanced with Immersion Tactile Effects
